gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Heat 120, Rockets 113
gameRecap.excerpt: The Heat defeated the Rockets, 120-113. Tyler Herro recorded 28 points (5-10 3PM) and three rebounds for the Heat, with Bam Adebayo adding 22 points and 12 rebounds in the victory. Fred VanVleet tallied 32 points, seven assists, and five rebounds for the Rockets in the losing effort. The Heat improve to 21-15 in the regular season, while the Rockets fall to 18-17.
